item.title: Shopassistant weird problem
item.dc:creator: @Liam_Baby Liam Baby
item.description:
@Liam_Baby wrote:

I can remember fixing something like this, but there’s a special part in one of the java files that changes it to pk points or what ever you’re doing it in. Just look around the shopassistant.java

You could try using this as a template, just change the shop id things around, hope it helps.

if (c.myShopId == 18) { if (c.pkPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){ c.pkPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID); c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1); c.getItems().resetItems(3823); } } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough pk points to buy this item."); }

Read full topic
